pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - PureSerenity Casino PureSerenity Home About us Casino Contacts Privacy Policy At PureSerenity Casino, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring a secure experience. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information. 1. Information We Collect We collect personal information that you provide to us, such as your name, email address, and payment details, when you register, make a deposit, or use our services. We may also collect information about your gaming activities and preferences. 2. How We Use Your Information We use your information to provide and improve our services, process transactions, communicate with you, and ensure compliance with our terms and conditions. We may also use your information for marketing purposes if you have opted in to receive promotional communications. 3. How We Protect Your Information We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, use, or disclosure. We use secure encryption technologies and regularly review our security practices to maintain a safe environment. 4. Sharing Your Information We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties, except as required by law or with your consent. We may share your information with our trusted service providers who assist us in operating our website and providing services. 5. Your Rights and Choices You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. You can also opt out of receiving marketing communications at any time by following the instructions provided in those communications. 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we encourage you to review it periodically. Your continued use of our services constitutes acceptance of the updated policy. The PureSerenity website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline Disclaimers Privacy & Policy Terms & Conditions

pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions - PureSerenity Casino PureSerenity Home About us Casino Contacts Terms and Conditions Welcome to PureSerenity Casino. By using our website, you represent and warrant that you meet these age requirements. 3. Account Registration To access certain features of our website, you may be required to register for an account. You agree to provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information during the registration process and to update your information as necessary. 4. We provide resources and tools to help you manage your gaming activity. 5. Payment and Withdrawals All deposits and withdrawals must be made using the payment methods available on our website. We reserve the right to verify your identity before processing any transactions. 6. Prohibited Activities You agree not to engage in any prohibited activities, including but not limited to, cheating, fraud, or using automated systems to gain an unfair advantage.
